postion.title: Security Development Student
postion.description: • Designing and integrating unit test cases in Python using Pytest framework for the core QNX Operating System • Implementing a Jenkins Pipeline to setup automated test environments • Assisting Developers in developing automation tools in C and resolving defects

postion.title: Student, Information System Cybersecurity
postion.description: • Developed a Phishing Tool that sends fraudulent email campaigns against 15 000 employees as a part of phishing awareness training. Automated results into CSV reports. Built using Python and PHP • Devised weekly Security Scans using Nessus Professional to ensure CIS compliance and identify vulnerabilities • Managed Forescout CounterACT and Palo Alto Panorama Firewall in order to monitor and control internet traffic and to protect production systems • Generated reports and tickets containing QIDs, CVEs, and other vulnerabilities for the mitigation teams

skills.programming: Python, Java, C, C++, JavaScript, MATLAB, Bash, PowerShell, Verilog, HTML, CSS
skills.framework: Django, React, Bootstrap, NumPy, OpenCV, TensorFlow
skills.technologies: Git, LaTeX, Eclipse IDE, SVN, db2, MySQL
skills.sectools: Nessus, Wireshark, Metasploit, Nmap, Burp Suite
skills.interests: Software Development, Cryptography, Machine Learning, Computer and Network Security

project.name: Stock Predictor
project.content: • Developed a web application that displays and analyses current stock prices and currency exchange values using the Alpha Vantage API which generates current and historical data • Utilizes Long-short term memory (LSTM) Recurrent Neural Network to give predications of future stock prices • Built front-end using Django framework.

project.name: Least Bit Encryption
project.content: Developed a Linux Command line tool application that encrypt and decrypts text in images using the Least Significant Bit algorithm, built using OpenCV.

project.name: Cipho
project.content: Developed a Windows application that encrypts and decrypts text and textfiles using various cryptographic algorithms and performs Statistical methods for decryption.

school.name: McMaster University
school.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering w/ CO-OP
